name: Time Slicer
description:
Time Slicer About

Time Slicer is a puzzle(?) game in which you can control the time using your ancient sword. Solve 7  levels based in caves to finish the game. 

Disclaimer

The game contains flashing colors which can be reduced in the menu.The slicing mechanics can sometimes be glitchy, be aware that you sometimes will need to attempt to cut something twice.

Tip: Space - skip cutscenes, R - reload level, M-return to menu
